m_szDocTitle: BYD E6 and the EV Range Solution | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: BYD E6 and the EV Range Solution August 15th, 2011 by Breath on the Wind   Build Your Dreams E6 BYD Co Ltd (Build Your Dreams 002594.SZ) is on schedule to enter the growing EV market with the E6 crossover in Q2 of 2012,  reports senior vice president Stella Li to Alysha Webb of Plug-in Cars. It is an interesting time in EV marketing as each manufacturer tries to present their technological solution and win EV popularity. Tesla first gave us the sexiest electric vehicle. Nissan is trying to give us the mass-produced EV. GM is telling us not to be afraid . While all the manufacturers are happy t
